name: Inarius's Reticence
flavorText: Inarius became watchful as the first nephalem grew up. His own son, Linarian, later known as Rathma, is said to have inherited his father's stoicism.
flavorTextHtml: Inarius became watchful as the first nephalem grew up. His own son, Linarian, later known as Rathma, is said to have inherited his father's stoicism.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Bone Armor damage is increased by 1000%.(4) Set:     
 Bone Armor grants an additional 3% damage reduction per enemy hit.(6) Set:     
 Bone Armor also activates a swirling tornado of bone, damaging nearby enemies for 1000% weapon damage and increasing the damage they take from the Necromancer by 10,000%.
setDescriptionHtml:

Bone Armor damage is increased by 1000%.

(6) Set:
Bone Armor also activates a swirling tornado of bone, damaging nearby enemies for 1000% weapon damage and increasing the damage they take from the Necromancer by 10,000%.
